Body.description:
This agent procedure will have the endpoint leave the Domain.
Action Item: Enter username and password when prompted (either when the procedure is being executed or scheduled.)
Created by Douglas Sanchez. (douglas.sanchez@kaseya.com)

Statement.description: The procedure calls PowerShell script that removes Endpoint from AD Domain. To run on a domain controller Version: 0.2 Author: Proserv Team - VS
Statement.name: GetVariable

Parameter.name: Command
Parameter.value: Powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Import-Module ActiveDirectory; [securestring]$SecPassword = '#password#' | ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText -Force; [PSCredential]$Cred = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList '#admin#', $SecPassword; Remove-Computer -UnjoinDomaincredential $Cred -PassThru -Restart -Force"
